verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Thank God for Jesus.
Thank Him for His grace and power.
In the day of fire,
He's coming forth in man
For all the earth to see in this hour.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Here we stand, bound in golden chains,
Tied to the heart of the Father,
Held by the love that walked up Calvary's hill
To become our Lord and Master.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Tell me the story of Jesus and His love.
Tell me how He rose and He took us all above.
Of His poured out life, our example to be.
That we might share His joy
And set creation free.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
If you think it's evil to serve the Lord,
And to walk in His precepts,
Choose you this day whom you will serve,
And make the choice with your whole heart.
